remarks: Make a structure from a triple.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Aug-2015.)
statement:
strle1.i $e |- I e. NN $.
strle1.a $e |- A = I $.
strle2.j $e |- I < J $.
strle2.k $e |- J e. NN $.
strle2.b $e |- B = J $.
strle3.k $e |- J < K $.
strle3.l $e |- K e. NN $.
strle3.c $e |- C = K $.
strle3 $p |- { <. A , X >. , <. B , Y >. , <. C , Z >. } Struct <. I , K >. $.
